en.title: Elevator Maintenance Management System | PraticOS
en.description: Stop missing contract deadlines! Work order system for elevator maintenance with automatic scheduling, equipment history and compliance checklists. Get organized in 5 minutes.
en.keywords: elevator maintenance software, lift maintenance management, elevator service system, elevator work order app, lift maintenance software, elevator management system
en.ogDescription: Stop missing deadlines! WO system with automatic scheduling, equipment history and compliance checklists. Get organized in 5 minutes.

hero.title: Stop missing contract deadlines:
hero.subtitle: Ditch the spreadsheet and never miss a preventive maintenance. Complete history by elevator, compliance checklists and contract expiration alerts.

problems.title: Do you face
problems.subtitle: Common pain points for elevator maintenance companies

items.title: Contracts expiring without notice
items.text: Maintenance contracts expire and you only find out when the customer complains. Lost recurring revenue.

items.title: Manual scheduling in spreadsheets
items.text: Preventive maintenance schedule in spreadsheet or paper. Miss visits and lose customer trust.

items.title: Don't know elevator history
items.text: Technician arrives on site and doesn't know what was done before. Wastes time asking the customer for information.

items.title: Paper inspection reports
items.text: Annual Inspection Reports done on paper. Hard to organize and find when inspection is required.

items.title: After-hours emergency calls
items.text: Late night and weekend emergencies. No control over which technician is closest.

items.title: Forget to bill extra calls
items.text: Handle calls outside the contract but forget to invoice. Lost revenue every month.

solutions.title: How
solutions.subtitle: Features designed for daily elevator maintenance operations

items.title: Contract expiration alerts
items.text: Receive notifications before contracts expire.

items.title: Automatic preventive scheduling
items.text: System automatically schedules preventive maintenance. Technician receives on their phone.

items.title: Complete history by elevator
items.text: Search by equipment number and see the full history. Maintenance, parts replaced, incidents.

items.title: Compliance checklists
items.text: Digital checklists following technical standards. Ready for inspection.

items.title: Photos with date, time and location
items.text: Prove the service performed with geolocated photos.

items.title: Extra call tracking
items.text: Record and invoice calls outside the contract. No lost revenue.

checklist.title: Preventive
checklist.text: Digital checklist following technical standards. Technician fills on phone and building manager signs digitally.

items.text: Elevator identification
Cables and pulleys inspection
Safety devices test
Doors and locks verification
Service photos
Manager digital signature

features.title: Everything you need to
features.subtitle: Powerful and intuitive tools to boost your productivity

items.title: Digital WO
items.text: Create complete work orders with photos, elevator history and values. All organized.

items.title: Geolocated Photos
items.text: Photograph the service with date, time and GPS location. Irrefutable proof of service.

items.title: PDF Reports
items.text: Generate maintenance reports and annual inspections in PDF. Ready to send to the manager.

items.title: Financial Control
items.text: See active contracts, billed extra calls and receivables. Complete dashboard.

items.title: Building Management
items.text: Complete history of each building and elevator. All previous services.

items.title: Tracking Link
items.text: Building manager tracks call status on their phone. No need to call.

testimonial.quote: Before I tracked contracts in a spreadsheet and always missed renewals. With PraticOS, I get alerts before expiration and building managers praise the organization of reports.
testimonial.name: Carlos Mendes

faq.title: Frequently asked
faq.subtitle: Get your questions answered before you start

items.question: Do I need to pay to use it?
items.answer: No! The free plan is real and has no time limit. You can use it forever with up to 30 photos/month. Our pricing is transparent and you don't need to talk to a salesperson.

items.question: Does it work for any type of elevator?
items.answer: Yes! PraticOS works for passenger elevators, freight elevators, dumbwaiters, platforms and escalators. The system adapts to your business.

items.question: Do the checklists follow technical standards?
items.answer: Yes! Our checklists were developed following technical standards. You can customize them according to your needs.

items.question: Will my technicians be able to use it?
items.answer: Absolutely! PraticOS was made to be as simple as using WhatsApp. If you know how to use a phone, you know how to use PraticOS.

items.question: What if I need help?
items.answer: We have email support and complete documentation. We respond within 24 business hours. Our team knows the daily routine of elevator maintenance.

download.title: Download now and
download.text: Available for iOS and Android. Start free!

contact.title: Need
contact.subtitle: Our team is ready to assist you
